languageToPublish: Please select in which language(s) you wish to submit this record:
briefProfileInfo: Briefly describe the relevant experience of the expert (150 words).
responsibilitiesInfo: Briefly describe how your work relates to biosafety and the area(s) of expertise for which you are being nominated.
previousEmployment: Please give details of relevant previous employment.
countriesWorked: Countries or regions where you have worked
nameOfPreviousEmployer: Name of Previous Employer / Organization / Company
titleDegree: Title of the Degree or other academic distinction and subject
professionalQualification: List a maximum of three other relevant professional qualifications.
expertiseInfo: Please select one or more areas of academic and professional expertise that most closely match the experience of the nominee.
relevantPublicationInfo: List your three most important publications related to your main field of expertise.
relevantProfessionalSocieties: relevant professional societies or organizations of which you are a member.
panelServed: Technical committees, expert panels or advisory bodies served
relevantTechnicalCommittees: relevant technical committees, expert panels or advisory bodies on which you have served and briefly describe your specific responsibilities.
timeFrame: Timeframe for confirmation or updating of information
timeFrameInfo: Please note that according to decision BS-IV/4, experts’ records are maintained on the roster for a period of <u>four</u> years from the last update of their information, after which they will be deleted from the roster unless re-nominated.
additionalInformationInfo: Please provide any other information relevant to your role as an expert (max. 300 words).
anyrelevantDocumentsInfo: Please use this field to provide any other relevant website addresses and/or one or more relevant documents that will be stored in the database for users to download.
notesInfos: The “Notes” field is for personal reference and can be seen only when the record is being edited. It will be hidden once the record is published. This field is not meant to be used for confidential information.
